person.persName: John J. Allen (Larue county, KY, cooper)

body.p: Larue County, Kentucky, cooper. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel Allen and Elizabeth LaRue Allen. Married to Catherine F. Pemberton Allen in Larue County, Kentucky, on December 31, 1854. Father of Charles W. Allen, Jacob L. Allen, Samuel G. Allen, and Sarah E. Allen. Cooper in Larue County in 1860.
